NK040(thi)029:2: drin chen rtsa ba dang brgyud par bcas pa'i dpal
NK040(thi)029:3: ldan bla ma dam pa rnams kyi bka' bden pa
NK040(thi)029:4: dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi yi dam rgyal
NK040(thi)029:5: ba'i dkyil 'khor chos skyong srung ma rnams kyi khyad
NK040(thi)029:6: par du ma cig lab kyi sgrol ma 'khor rigs
NK040(thi)029:8: grub thob gcod yul brgyud pa'i lha tshogs rnams kyi bka' bden pa chen po'i mthu stobs kyi /
NK040(thi)029:9: bdag cag dpon slob dgon sde grwa tshang 'khor dang
NK040(thi)029:10: bcas pa rnams la gnod cing 'tshe bar byed pa'i
NK040(thi)029:14: bar du gcod par byed pa'i dgra bgegs byad ma de nyid mtho ri rab kyi rtse /
NK040(thi)029:16: bar 'byung ba bzhi rnams su gar gnas kyang pho
NK040(thi)029:17: nya lcags kyu 'bar ba can gyis snying nas zungs
NK040(thi)029:18: / zhags pa 'bar ba can gyis mgul du chings //
NK040(thi)029:19: lcags sgrog 'bar ba can gyi yan lag bsdom //
NK040(thi)029:20: dril bu 'bar ba can gyis myos su chugs //
NK040(thi)029:21: 'jigs pa'i mun nag chen pos sngon nas bsus //
NK040(thi)029:22: las kyi rlung dmar chen pos rgyab nas phul //
NK040(thi)029:23: skad cig rang dbang med par dmigs pa'i rten 'di la myur du khug cig /
NK040(thi)029:24: badz+ra a kar sha ya h'u dzah ces lana gsuma /
NK040(thi)029:25: g.yon lcags kyu'i phyag rgya dang /
NK040(thi)029:27: spro rigs bzhi so sor phral ba dang /
NK040(thi)029:30: yum chen sku gsung thugs las sprul pa la //
NK040(thi)029:31: rigs bzhi mkha' 'gro ging dang bcas //
NK040(thi)029:32: yang sprul pho nya bsam mi khyab //
NK040(thi)029:33: sku mdog sna tshogs cir yang ston //
NK040(thi)029:34: g.yas kyi phyag na phur pa bsnams //
NK040(thi)029:35: g.yon gyi phyag na lcags kyu dang //
NK040(thi)029:36: zhags pa lcags sgrogs dril bu bsnams //
NK040(thi)029:37: myur mgyogs rlung gis rta la zhon //
NK040(thi)029:38: dam nyams dgra bgegs sdig can rnams //
NK040(thi)029:39: phyogs mtshams steng 'og thams cad kyis //
NK040(thi)029:40: sa steng sa 'og sa bla kun //
NK040(thi)029:41: 'byung ba bzhi yi gnas rnams nas //
NK040(thi)029:42: rang dbang med par 'dir khug cig /
NK040(thi)029:43: bsrung zhing skyob pa'i lha dang phrol //
NK040(thi)029:44: gzugs byang 'di la bstim par gyis //
NK040(thi)029:45: badz+ra rat+na pad+ma karma d+aak+ki ni gnod byed 'byung po
NK040(thi)029:46: dgra bgegs sarba sha trum badz+ra ang+ku sha dza dza
NK040(thi)029:50: n+ri yang dza dzah tri yang dza dza /
NK040(thi)029:51: ces gzugs la dgug shing bstim /
NK040(thi)029:52: slar yang sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro'i gzugs la dbab pa ni /
NK040(thi)029:54: sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro'i dus la bab //
NK040(thi)029:55: gnod cing 'tshe ba'i dgra dang bgegs //
NK040(thi)029:56: gdug cing sdang sems ldan pa kun //
NK040(thi)029:57: rnam shes gzugs la myur du phob //
NK040(thi)029:58: a mu ka a we sha ya h'u phatah rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i lha dang dbye ba ni /
NK040(thi)029:60: rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i dus la babs //
NK040(thi)029:61: gnod cing 'tshe ba'i dgra dang bgegs //
NK040(thi)029:62: gdug cing sdang sems ldan pa rnams //
NK040(thi)029:63: 'go ba'i lha dang phral bar gyis //
NK040(thi)029:64: n+ri tri ru tra pra we sha ya phatah rin chen mkha' 'gro'i byad du bcug pa ni /
NK040(thi)029:66: rin chen mkha' 'gro'i dus la babs //
NK040(thi)029:67: gnod cing 'tshe ba'i dgra dang bgegs //
NK040(thi)029:68: gdug cing sdang sems ldan pa rnams //
NK040(thi)029:69: zung zhig chings shig rnam par ching //
NK040(thi)029:70: a mu ka sha trum a pa na ya h'u phatah pad+ma mkha' 'gro'i myos su bcug pa ni /
NK040(thi)029:73: gnod cing 'tshe ba'i dgra dang bgegs //
NK040(thi)029:74: gdug cing sdang sems ldan pa kun //
NK040(thi)029:75: lus ngag yid gsum myos par gyis //
NK040(thi)029:76: a mu ka dz+wa la pa ya h'u phatah de
NK040(thi)029:77: nas khros ma nag mos gdab cing bsgral ba ni
NK040(thi)029:78: / phur bu lag tu thog la /
NK040(thi)029:79: stong pa'i ngang las rang nyid khros ma nag mor
NK040(thi)029:80: gsal ba'i lag pa g.yas g.yon gyi sor mo bcu
NK040(thi)029:81: rigs lnga yab yum bcur sbyor ba mdzad pa'i byang
NK040(thi)029:82: sems h'u yig mthing nag 'bar ba yongs su gyur
NK040(thi)029:83: pa las rje btsun khros ma nag mo sku smad
NK040(thi)029:84: gnam lcags kyi phur pa mgar gyi sol me nas
NK040(thi)029:85: byung ba ltar dmar zing nger ba /
NK040(thi)029:86: dgra bgegs gnod byed kyi snying la gzir bar bsam /
NK040(thi)029:88: phyogs bcu'i bde bar gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa phul /
NK040(thi)029:89: de rnams 'od du zhu nas phur bu la thim
NK040(thi)029:90: pas bsgril ba tsam gyis khams gsum sgrol nus pa'i
NK040(thi)029:91: dbang dang byin rlabs thob par bsam /
NK040(thi)029:92: sarba ta th+aa ga ta ka ya w+aak+ka tsit+ta a b+hi shiny+tsa mam /
NK040(thi)029:93: ye d+harma sogs brjod la rab gnas bya /
NK040(thi)029:94: de nas phur bu bsgril zhing /
NK040(thi)029:95: h'uh dus gsum bde gshegs thams cad dang //
NK040(thi)029:96: yum chen sku yi sprul pa la sras mchog bud+d+ha ki la ya //
NK040(thi)029:97: mgo bo rgya mdud rtse zur gsum //
NK040(thi)029:98: zur brgyad gzi byin dbal dang ldan //
NK040(thi)029:99: dam nyams dgra bgegs sdig can gyis //
NK040(thi)029:100: spyi bo'i dkyil du gdab byas pas //
NK040(thi)029:101: lus kyi rten dang phral bar mdzod //
NK040(thi)029:102: bud+d+ha ki li k+ai la ya dgra bgegs sha trum ma ra ya h'u phatah h'u /
NK040(thi)029:103: dus gsum bde gshegs thams cad dang //
NK040(thi)029:104: yum chen gsung gi sprul pa la //
NK040(thi)029:105: sras mchog pad+ma mgo bo rgya mdud zur brgyad gzi
NK040(thi)029:106: byin dam nyams dgra lce yi dkyil du gdab ngag
NK040(thi)029:107: gi rten dang phral bar pad+ma ki li k+ai la
NK040(thi)029:108: ya dgra bgegs sha trum h'u /
NK040(thi)029:109: dus gsum yum chen thugs kyi sras mchog badz+ra ki
NK040(thi)029:110: mgo bo rgya mdud rtse zur brgyad gzi byin tsit+ta'i
NK040(thi)029:112: rnam shes rten dang phral bar mdzod //
NK040(thi)029:113: badz+ra ki li k+ai la ya dgra bgegs sha trum ma h'u /
NK040(thi)029:114: dus gsum bde gshegs yum chen yon tan sprul pa la //
NK040(thi)029:115: sras mchog rat+na ki la ya //
NK040(thi)029:116: mgo bo rgya mdud rtse zur brgyad gzi byin dam
NK040(thi)029:117: nyams dgra lte ba'i dkyil du gdab lus kyi rten
NK040(thi)029:119: rat+na ki li k+ai la ya dgra bgegs sha trum ma ra ya h'u phatah h'u /
NK040(thi)029:120: dus gsum bde yum chen phrin las sprul sras mchog karma ki la ya //
NK040(thi)029:121: mgo bo rgya mdud rtse zur zur brgyad gzi byin dbal dang ldan //
NK040(thi)029:122: gsang ba'i dkyil du gdab byas pas //
NK040(thi)029:123: rdul phran bzhin du brlag par mdzod //
NK040(thi)029:124: karma ki li k+ai la ya dgra bgegs sha trum ma ra ya h'u phata /
NK040(thi)029:125: ces tshe khrus kyi dgongs pa dang ldan pa'i phur bu gdab bsgral /
NK040(thi)029:126: de nas las kyi mkha' 'gros gtun du brdung ba ni /
NK040(thi)029:127: ling ga hom khung du rdo rje tho bas brdung la /
NK040(thi)029:129: las kyi mkha' 'gro'i dus la babs //
NK040(thi)029:130: dngos grub 'phrog par byed pa yi //
NK040(thi)029:131: gdug cing sdang sems ldan pa rnams //
NK040(thi)029:132: lus ngag rdul phran bzhin du rlogs //
NK040(thi)029:133: a mu ka ta tha ya h'u phatah de nas
NK040(thi)029:134: ling ro zhing lpags gam snod du bcug la mkha'
NK040(thi)029:136: sbyin sreg bya tshe me nang 'bul lo //
NK040(thi)029:139: rdo rje 'chang chen man chad nas //
NK040(thi)029:140: rtsa ba'i bla ma yan chad kyis //
NK040(thi)029:141: khyed grub thob brgyud pa'i bla ma rnams //
NK040(thi)029:142: gnam sa tsam gyi zhal gdangs la //
NK040(thi)029:143: ri rab tsam gyis mche ba gtsigs //
NK040(thi)029:144: bar snang tsam gyis ljags brkyang la //
NK040(thi)029:145: stong gsum tsam gyi dmigs pa ru //
NK040(thi)029:146: dam nyams las ngan sdig can gyi //
NK040(thi)029:147: dug lnga bsgral ba'i phung po dang //
NK040(thi)029:148: sha khrag rus pa'i tshogs rnams dang //
NK040(thi)029:149: dbang po nang rol bcas pa kun //
NK040(thi)029:150: zhal du bstabs so kha ram kh+aa hi //
NK040(thi)029:151: mgur du sgrim mo a ra li //
NK040(thi)029:152: dbyings su bstim mo sa ma ya //
NK040(thi)029:153: tshogs su 'bul lo dgyes par rol //
NK040(thi)029:154: bzhes shig lhag ma med par mdzod //
NK040(thi)029:155: yum chen shes rab phar phyin man chad dang //
NK040(thi)029:156: yi dam lha tshogs yan chad la //
NK040(thi)029:157: khyed sde snod rgyud sde'i lha tshogs rnams //
NK040(thi)029:159: ma mgon lcam dral man chad dang //
NK040(thi)029:160: ging chen ging chung yan chad kyis //
NK040(thi)029:161: khyed chos skyong pho rgyud mo rgyud rnams //
NK040(thi)029:163: tshangs pa brgya byin man chad dang //
NK040(thi)029:165: khyed phyi rim dpal mgon srung ma rnams //
NK040(thi)029:167: be har rgyal po man chad dang //
NK040(thi)029:168: grong rgyug 'dre mo yan chad kyis //
NK040(thi)029:169: khyed lha srin sde brgyad 'khor bcas kyis //
NK040(thi)029:171: byi na ya ga man chad dang //
NK040(thi)029:172: the'u rang spun dgu yan chad kyis //
NK040(thi)029:173: khyed bgegs rigs stong phrag brgyad cu rnams //
NK040(thi)029:175: ri dbang rgyal po man chad dang //
NK040(thi)029:176: gnyan sa 'dir gnas yan chad kyi //
NK040(thi)029:177: khyed snang zhing srid pa'i lha 'dre rnams //
NK040(thi)029:180: de nas gtor gzhong ma ltar gsal /
NK040(thi)029:181: de nas rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis rol /
NK040(thi)029:183: nad pa gal che ma slong pa dang /
NK040(thi)029:184: rang bzhin blo bur nad dang /
NK040(thi)029:185: smyo 'bog la sogs byung na zhing lpags gam phyar
NK040(thi)029:186: ba ru tshogs kyi zhal zas dang nad pa bcug
NK040(thi)029:187: la go 'byed la sogs byas la /
NK040(thi)029:188: 'di'i skabs su rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis bzung ste /
NK040(thi)029:190: rjes su yang dmag 'gyed kyi tshig bshad /
NK040(thi)029:191: gnas sor mdo kyis mtha' gtad rnams bya'o //
NK040(thi)029:192: de man chad gar thod thod du mi bya ba gnad yin no //
NK040(thi)029:193: 'di pan+di ta chig don yod rdo rjes mdzad pa'i gzhung dang /
NK040(thi)029:194: sangs rgyas gnyen ston gyis mdzad pa'i tshogs bsgral mchod gzhung la brten nas /
NK040(thi)029:195: cung zhig gsal bar ngag 'don rgyun chags su bya
NK040(thi)029:196: bral kun dga' 'bum gyis bris pa dge legs 'phel
